Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
73 Saraṇaduka, Upādinnattika
Saraṇaduka, Upādinnattika
84.
227Araṇaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
228Araṇaṃ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
